stripped_text: When you score Brain Rewiring, you may pay X credits to force the Runner to add X cards from his or her grip to the bottom of his or her stack at random then draw 1 card.
text: When you score Brain Rewiring, you may pay X[credit] to force the Runner to add X cards from his or her grip to the bottom of his or her stack at random then draw 1 card.
title: Brain Rewiring
